title: [spunge] - Pedigree Chump
description:
I mourn the loss of oink.cd by uploading everything I got from there that is not on TPB yet :)    Please do the same if you were a member.


from wikipedia:
Pedigree Chump is the debut album from the British ska punk band [spunge]. It was released following the success of the Kicking Pigeons EP pressed a year earlier that sold 5000 copies to early followers at pub gigs.

The first 3,000 copies of the album included a five track bonus CD of live recordings. The standard album was re-released in December 2000 as a limited edition digipak without the bonus tracks. In 2004, the album was again re-released as a limited edition in a slipcase. The bonus tracks were bundled back onto this version, plus a rare demo of \\\&#039;Make Me Happy\\\&#039; and an enhanced video of \\\&#039;Kicking Pigeons\\\&#039;.

No singles were ever released from Pedigree Chump. However, the song \\\&#039;Kicking Pigeons\\\&#039; can be found on the Kicking Pigeons EP and an updated version of the same song is the second A-side on Live Another Day/Kicking Pigeons 2001, a single from their next album Room For Abuse.

\\\&#039;Intro\\\&#039; and \\\&#039;Have Another Go\\\&#039; are short comedic tracks mainly comprising of people talking in strange accents. Also, at the end of \\\&#039;Whinger\\\&#039; there is a hidden comedy track about custard. It is speculated that the track \\\&#039;Ode 2 Slimy Bassless\\\&#039; is about former [spunge] bassist Simon Bayliss.
